value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|The goddess Lady Nerþuz is god
of the land. She is the younger sister
of King Njörðr, god of the sea.$k$pShe is mother of Lord Freyr and
Lady Freyja both—and she loves all
creatures that live upon the land.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Every creature? If that's the case, she
must be very kind. If we can just talk
to her, I'm sure things will work out!$k$p$Sbs5000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That seems like the best approach.
If we can resolve this without a fight,
we should try...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Well, it has been such a long
time since I have had guests.
Why have you come I wonder?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|L-Lady Nerþuz!$k$p$Sbs1000|$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Pain2|Y-you! My...my...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|...What is that look?$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_06,0|$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Smile|My...how precious you all are!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Us?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Smile|You, children of Midgard! Each and
every one of you! Look at you...
Could you be any more adorable?$k$p$EFace_Pain|You sweet little darlings... I will
keep you safe!$k$p$EFace_Blush|Now, come here and let me
squeeze you! You don't mind,
do you? Of course not.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|Gah! Er...ummm...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Smile|Aw! Just adorable! Look at your little
faces... Cute even when you haven't
a clue what's happening...$k$p$EFace_Blush|So small, so young...so sweet!
My, you children of Midgard are
as adorable as ever!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|Lady Nerþuz, we are no children...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|In the eyes of the gods, all mortals
might be considered children...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Blush2|Hm... Lady Nerþuz, we've come to
ask that you please return the Ár
you took from King Njörðr.$k$pWe were sent to collect it. We are
in need of it and would prefer to
avoid fighting for it, if possible.$k$pSo, please...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Anger|Oh! How troubling... Cute as you may
be, you come before me with such
nasty threats...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Please! We need it if we're to save
our world!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Anger|Ah! So it's all of you who come with
vile intentions. I see... And I imagine
you have come at his direction...$k$pNo! Naughty children... I will not be
returning the Ár to Njörðr. He must
not have it!$k$p

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Lady Nerþuz, where are you going?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Cool2|Deeper within my temple... It would
not do for me to harm the precious
children of Midgard.$k$p$EFace|With only the strength of mortals,
it would be unwise for you to follow.
Give up your quest. Leave this place.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We have no choice. We'll need
to follow Lady Nerþuz inside...$k$p
